name: Purp v. Green
description:
Two painters are competing to be the best painters in the world. The goal is to paint the entire room into their preferred color. One prefers purple and the other prefers green. Which painter do you want to succeed?

Purp v. Green is a multiplayer grid-based game where two players are competing to paint each block on the grid and get the most blocks colored until the time runs out. There are two colors that the players can select to compete as the title states; purple or green. The player with the most colored blocks corresponding to their color wins the game.

This game is a student project being worked on under Game Design 210: Game Studio. Our devlogs will be posted as we make progress with the development of Purp v. Green. What you see here is our assets and how the screen of the game  would look as our visual prototype.
